SALESFORCE HELP
DOCS
REBATE MANAGEMENT
Map Fields Between Target Transaction Object and Transaction Journal

To view eligible and applied rebate types on any object’s record, map the fields of the object with fields in Transaction Journal by using the ObjectHierarchyRelationship metadata API. If you don’t create these field mappings, Rebate Management shows all integratable rebate types on the Eligible tab and doesn’t show any rebate type on the Applied tab of the Program Rebate Types panel.

Field Mappings for Eligible and Applied Rebate Types
Use the ObjectHierarchyRelationship metadata API to map fields between any standard or custom object and Transaction Journal. Rebate Management uses these field mappings to show the list of eligible and applied rebate types on the Program Rebate Types panel of a target record. The eligibility criteria of a rebate type determine whether it’s shown on a transaction record.
Create Mappings for Eligible and Applied Rebate Types
To create field mappings between Transaction Journal and a standard or custom object, or create field mappings between the Transaction Journal and an aggregate object, admins can retrieve and deploy files by using the ObjectHierarchyRelationship metadata API.
